title: Lunge / Front Kicks
description: Stand straight up with a tight core and flat back. Keep your gaze focused straight ahead as you step back with your right leg. As you step forward into the starting position, launch the right leg into a front kick. Use the left side hand to touch your toe, if you are able to. Return your right leg to the starting position. Repeat on other side. Keep alternating until you complete the set.
